features: [MULTIPLE USES LIVE HEALTHIER] - Our luxury handheld bidet sprayer isn't just for your personal hygiene, it's perfect for pet cleaning, baby cloth diaper sprayer, Muslim shower, women during pregnancy and even floor cleaning those less-than-exciting toilet cleaning tasks. Say goodbye to the dirty work!

[10-MINUTE EASY DIY SETUP] - Offers two simple installation options: wall mounting with screws or tank mounting without the need for drilling. Comes with an installation manual and videos. If you have any questions or are missing parts for this jet spray, LUFEIDRA provides professional assistance.

[ADJUSTABLE WATER PRESSURE] - Offers two hydraulic modes: effective jet spray and gentle soft spray. Adjust the water pressure of this bidet toilet sprayer with a simple press to meet various cleaning needs for pets, kids, and the whole family.

[UPGRADED NYLON 7/8" T-VALVE] - We specially designed the T-valve as a plastic nut and an easy-adjustable handle, which is more matched with the plastic toilet tank connector than the metal nut, and minimizes water leakage. Plastic nut requires no tools and is easy to tighten by hand.

[HIGH-QUALITY WORKMANSHIP] - Our toilet bidet sprayer is crafted with premium materials, featuring a 304 stainless steel sprayer and faucet spray hose, along with a durable brass T-valve. With smooth and user-friendly edges, it's the best choice for your daily cleaning needs and achieves all-around cleaning that is more hygienic.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Watch This Luxury Bidet in Action! LUFEIDRA develops an upgraded BIDET SPRAYER that offers reliable functionality and quality, while still remaining affordable.

ADJUSTABLE WATER FLOW SOFT SPRAY Gently water pressure to personal cleaning, especially for women during pregnancy and menstrual cycles. JET SPRAY Strong water pressure to clean your toilet/floor, wash baby cloth diapers/pet bath washing, etc.
Previous page Next page 1 New Upgrade T-valve 2 Weighted Spray Head 3 Smooth Hook Edge 4 Stainless Steel Hose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Personal Hygiene!
reviews.reviewText: Its ease of installation, adjustable pressure, and versatile use make it a must-have for a clean and hygienic experience. Despite some minor drawbacks, the overall value and performance make this sprayer a worthwhile investment!I got mine installed in about 30min, took more time making it pretty and making sure I had a spot to mount it.Pros:- Easy Installation: Was a breeze to install, even for a non-DIY person like me.- Adjustable Pressure: The adjustable water pressure features a comfortable cleaning experience.- Durable Build: The sprayer is well-built and feels sturdy in hand, promising long-lasting use.- Versatile Use: Perfect for personal hygiene, cloth diapering, and even cleaning the toilet bowl.- Budget-Friendly: A great value for the price.Cons:- Limited Hose Length: The hose length could be longer for added flexibility during installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and install
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. As a wheelchair user, it is important to me to be able to do as much personal care as possible and a bidet allows me to do so. The last one I had was a very fancy model, but that comes at a hefty price. There was so much that could go wrong and that is why I ended up replacing it rather quickly. I came across this one at a really good price and I originally thought I would use it until I found another high end one.Much to my surprise, I actually like this one better, because it is so simple. It was very easy to install. It takes a couple of minutes to install the t adapter into the water pipe. After that, all I needed to do was screw in the hose and sprayer. With my last one, I had to get a handy man to help because it needed to be connected to the hot water, mounted to the toilet, and then the seat replaced on top of it. Not everyone has this issue, but with the other one I had to alter my handicapped rails because it took up so much extra space. I didn't have that problem with this one, because it didn't need any additional room. If you are limited on space for whatever reason, this is something to consider before deciding on a bidet.It does lack some of the features that I had before like being able to adjust the temperature, but I really don't miss it. If you are in a very cold climate, maybe this would bother you, but even on really cold days I don't have a problem with it. I was able to adjust the water pressure with both models,but it was a much easier process with this one. How hard you squeeze the trigger determines how high the pressure is. With the other one I had to adjust 3 knobs and it was mostly trial and error. It is great for families because it is so simple to adjust where the water is pointing. With the last one, I kept having to adjust it whenever someone else used my bathroom. You can also spray off your lady bits whereas most bidets are pointed at the back area only.It's very convenient for people who plan to use it on someone other than themselves as well. A traditional bidet is made for the user to control. However, this sprayer is much easier for a caregiver to use or to help a child on the toilet. It's also very handy for rinsing out cloth diapers or period panties. I have even used it while cleaning the toilet and the nearby tub.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A solid design and works Great.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this on advice from a relative and it works great. Installs in 5-10 minutes (just remember to turn off the water valve first; OOPS). We keep the nozzle laying in the bathtub as on RARE occasions the sprayer lever sticks and it oozes water, but that has only happened 2x in a year. NOTE; if you have small children, turn off the nozzle each time as it makes a World Class squirt gun and will spray water a good 30+ feet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used for rinsing baby poo diapers, works great with adjustable spray
reviews.reviewText: This works great and installed in about 30 minutes. You might need two adjustable wrenches, one to torque the t-joint and another to hold the bottom of the toilet inlet. A wrench and plyers may work too. The adjustable spray is strong enough to blast away thick poop from a dirty baby diaper, but can also be used as a gentle rinse. If you get a sprayer that only has one power level and it's too strong, you'll get splashed too much. If it's too weak, it won't spray off enough baby poo. The handle does stick in the holder some, but you can wrap it in tape to solve this small problem.This sprayer has an off valve so you can turn off the water to it when not in use. You don't want a hose sprayer leaking when you're not home and flooding the bathroom. The valve is very easy to turn and is clearly on or off just by looking at or touching it.I took back one star because the rubber ring around the spray handle gets stuck in the holder. I had to use one hand to hold the mount in place on the side of the tank, and the other hand to take out the sprayer. I got tired of this and wrapped the rubber ring in clear tape, so now the handle doesn't get stuck in the holder anymore.Be sure to buy a diaper spray shied like the SimplyImagine SprayStand which I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I’m 67 years old, took me 10 minutes to install it, it’s true you need to use both of the washers, you don’t need the plumbing tape

Honestly it’s so easy to install especially using the video that the seller had sent. That’s really rare and considerate. 5 star rating for value added service and superb product.Don’t think twice. It works perfectly!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent Product ! No Leaks ! No Drips ! 10 min quick and easy install !
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Product ! No Leaks ! No Drips ! 10 min quick and easy install !

Very easy to install and easy basic to follow instruction. Nice adjustable sprayer and very handy. Makes you feel good and clean with the pressure adjustable to your liking. I find the hose head holder could be better to hold the base of the sprayer tight and more snug. Great purchase.
Good quality. Works well so far
The product is as good as is described in the video. About 5 minutes to install, and so far have not had any leakage or other issues. Would recommend.
